A considerable loss may be incurred whil: A considerable loss may be incurred while trading in Digital Assets; hence you are strongly advised to determine your financial risk tolerance before trading and consider the following risks:
Digital Assets are currently unregulated: Digital Assets are currently unregulated in many countries, and trading, holding, and transferring some or all Digital Assets may be deemed illegal in some countries in the future. KIBO is not available in the United States of America, the United Kingdom, North Korea, Syria, Iran or other restricted jurisdictions. By entering Kibo trading app you certify to not be a US or UK persons, or persons from other restricted jurisdictions.
The value of any Digital Asset is extrem: The value of any Digital Asset is extremely volatile, and you may sustain a complete loss of your Funds. Kibo is not responsible for the market of Digital Assets, and we make no representations or warranties concerning the real or perceived value of Digital Assets as denominated in any quoted currency. You understand and acknowledge that the value of Digital Assets can be volatile, and you agree that we are not in any way responsible or liable for any losses you may incur by holding or trading Digital Assets, even if the Kibo Services were delayed, suspended, or interrupted for any reason.
Due to the digital assets and virtual cu: Due to the digital assets and virtual currencies being in a nascent stage, during a force majeure event or market disruption, you may face difficulties or impossibility in liquidating your position under specific market conditions.
Digital Assets are not backed by a finan: Digital Assets are not backed by a financial regulator, central banks, or any other government-backed entity, and as such, there is no third-party that may take any corrective action upon the occurrence of a regional/global crisis.
Since most Digital Assets are held onlin: Since most Digital Assets are held online, they are susceptible to security breaches, and that may end up compromising the anonymity or integrity or of the system that produce such Digital Assets.
We do not provide investment advice, tax: We do not provide investment advice, tax advice, financial advice or any other professional advice and any content on the Website should not be considered as such advice as such substitute for tailored investment, financial advice. The contents of the Website does not constitute a comprehensive or complete statement of the matters discussed or the law relating thereto. The contents of the Website should not be used as a basis for making investment decisions and should not be construed as an attempt to market or promote any type of Digital Asset.
You acknowledge that the aforementioned: You acknowledge that the aforementioned is a not an exhaustive statement of risks associated with the trading of Digital Assets and that there may be additional risks not foreseen or listed by the Company.
By using our Services, you agree and ack: By using our Services, you agree and acknowledge that current Digital Asset prices or other financial information provided by Kibo cannot be guaranteed in any way. All investments do entail a risk of loss and which may result in loss of money. You also understand and acknowledge that all investments are subject to currency fluctuations, market dynamics, business, economic, political, and other risks. Investments in newly launched Tokens may involve greater risks than investments in bigger, more mature Digital Assets. You should always consult with a professional investment consultant or advisor before making investment decisions or deciding on significant changes to your personal financial strategy. Kibo does not offer investment advice in any manner.
